bean-bag-furniture.Name: Ringo Bean Bag Sofa in Grey
bean-bag-furniture.Body:
Ring out the old and bring in the new. Inspired by the rounded shape of a drum kit, this bean bag chair is aptly named after our favorite mop top drummer. Stuffed with beads and upholstered with premium grade fabric, the armless chair is durable enough to withstand the rigors of indoor use.

General Dimensions:  L90cm, H75cm
Seat Height: 35cm
Material:  High tech polyester
Suitable for:  Indoors
Filling:  Polystyrene beads

 

Free Delivery

1‑Year Warranty

30-Days Return

bean-bag-furniture.Name: Vetro Bean Bag + Ottoman in Grey
bean-bag-furniture.Body:
You of course deserve THE best seat in the house! Well, this is it. Generously filled with micro beads, our ultra swanky bean bag chair uniquely conforms to the shape of your booty bump. Accompanied by a matching ottoman, the set will have you kicking up your feet when lounging like a queen or king.

Chair Seat Height: 30cm

Suitable for:  Indoors

Removable Cover

bean-bag-furniture.Name: Moby Bean Bag + Ottoman in Grey
bean-bag-furniture.Body:
Have a seat and stay awhile. Featuring a concave setting that cuddles and caresses your bum, this bean bag chair delivers an intensive level of soothing comfort. Though lovably comfy, the fabric used to cover the bean filled chair and matching ottoman is durable enough for both indoor and outdoor use.

bean-bag-furniture.Name: Yoko Armchair Sofabed
bean-bag-furniture.Body:
Why commit? Keep your options open with an armchair that magically converts into a cushy guest bed. Engineered for quick and easy configuration, this unique piece of multi-functional furniture allows you to choose its purpose as desired. A perfect choice for anyone whose buddies have a tendency to crash on the couch.


 
Product Details     

  • General Dimensions:  D105cm X H70cm
  • Seating Height: 35cm
  • Material: High tech polyesters
  • Suitable for: Indoors and outdoors
  • Filling:  Polystyrene beads
  • Cover:  Removable, machine washable

 

Free Delivery

1‑Year Warranty

30-Days Return

bean-bag-furniture.Name: Kolton Leisure Chair Grey
bean-bag-furniture.Body:
Chic and streamlined, it’s just enough furniture to complete your space. An embracing shape with a solid wood frame and built-in foam cushioning creates that supported, medium-firm sit.

kids-loungers.Name: Hugbear Bean Bag Chequered Blue
kids-loungers.Body:
Lightweight & made with a soft cloth, the Hugbear Bean Bag is so cute, you’ll most likely hug it instead of sit on it. The chequered pattern helps make it fit into any interior scheme. The Hugbear has a mouth, ears and even arms that act as armrests for kids and lovable hugs for young adults. It comes with a cute carry handle too to easily lift and shift it around.

Free Delivery

1‑Year Warranty

30-Days Return



Product Details   
Dimensions: W50, L80, H80cm
Size: Kids and Adults
Seating Height: 30cm
Material: High tech polyesters
Suitable for: Indoors and outdoors
Filling: Polystyrene beads
Cover: Machine washable
Care: Comes with a filling bag – empty the bean bag in 30 seconds and wash the cover.

sale.Name: Bean Bag Refill 70 Liters (1kg)
sale.Body:
Our beans are high quality expanded polystyrene 'beads'. They look like tiny white peas. Polystyrene beads do compress after some time so it is recommended that you top them up from time to time. Our beanbags have built-in zippers to allow filling and emptying should you want to wash your cover or change the polystyrene beads.

 

How many bags do I need?
- Just refill: 1 bag
- Fill up kids size beanbag: 2-3 bags
- Fill up adult size beanbag: 3-4 bags

throw-pillows.Body:
This modern cushion gives your living room a fresh look and brings colours to your life. Pairing up with your existing furniture such as Sofa or Armchair, it spices up your space and decorate your otherwise empty furniture. The fibre-filled cushion is soft and supportive. The cover is made from soft, durable cotton fabric. It’s a truly tasteful decorative item.

-----------------------

Dimensions:
40 cm X 40 cm

Material:

Cushion Cover: Cotton
Cushion pad filling: Fibre

Cushion Care:
Removable cover- hand wash only
Do not bleach or soak.
Do not tumble dry
Warm iron on reverse if required.

-----------------------

 

  Free Delivery

1‑Year Warranty

30-Days Return
